entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:37 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
